ValidationRule.description: Contact First Name, Last Name, Email Address, Address required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( isChanged( Contact__c ), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" , OR( ISBLANK(Contact__r.MailingStreet ),ISBLANK(Contact__r.MailingCity),ISBLANK(Contact__r.MailingPostalCode),ISBLANK(Contact__r.Email) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Primary Contact Mailing City, Primary Contact Mailing Zip Code, Primary Contact Phone, Primary Contact Email required to proceed to Underwriting Stage.
